An ingressive verb shows that the action that is being described is just starting to happen, for example get in get dark or fall in fall silent: The verb has an ingressive meaning. Ingressive verbs focus on the beginning of an event. Synonym
inchoative
An ingressive sound is made by breathing in while you speak: In English, ingressive sounds usually express surprise. Some languages of southern Africa use ingressive sounds quite frequently.
More examplesFewer examplesIn the Inuktitut language, "-liq-" is an ingressive affix.

a verb that shows that the action that is being described is just starting to happen: Ingressives occur more frequently in narratives than in descriptions. Many children have difficulty using ingressives. Synonym
inchoative
a sound that is made by breathing in while you speak: The languages of the Khoisan family contain a large number of ingressives. They speak an exotic dialect which is characterized by the use of ingressives.
